name: Pauline Wins
descriptions: Pauline Wins is an "up-and-coming criminal" living with her partner Sammy Wins at their hideout in 2281.

She and Sammy previously robbed the Vikki and Vance Casino, taking Vance's lucky hat, Vikki's bonnet, and Vance's 9mm submachine gun. After Primm Slim caught them, Pauline distracted and hacked Primm Slim while Sammy took all the loot.

topics.response_text: You'd best not try any funny business, stranger. One word from me, and Vance will plant you in the ground!

topics.topic: PaulineCharismaCharm Pauline into Rethinking their plan.
topics.topic_text: That's the greatest plan I've ever heard in my entire life.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Really? You think so? We've only got the one gun, and there's two of us... and we've never done anything like this before...

topics.topic_text: I know the two of you stole Vance's gun down in Primm.
topics.response_text: Why would I deny it? I was the one that hacked that Cowboy Robot while Vance kept him busy. Ain't the first thing we stole. Won't be the last.

topics.topic_text: You sound pretty tough. Why haven't I heard of you two before?
topics.response_text: We ain't never heard of you, either, so the not being impressed is mutual.
Sammy and me got our hands on a powerful weapon not too long ago: Vance's gun. You know - Vance, of Vance and Vikki?

topics.topic_text: Your plan is going to get you both killed.
topics.response_text: You'll see! You'll feel stupid that you made fun of us when you learn how rich we are!
I'm Pauline, of Sammy and Pauline, the wasteland's most dangerous and notorious criminal couple!

conversation.response_text: Sammy and I are grateful. We are going to follow our dreams.
